com.battlebardgames.tinysui
Class TextBox

java.lang.Object
  com.battlebardgames.tinysui.UiElement
      com.battlebardgames.tinysui.TextBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<UiElement>
public class TextBox
extends UiElement

A textbox UI component. Can also act as a password field.

Author:
Thomas Cashman, Keith Cummins
